methods.name: render
methods.description: Requests a plot to be rendered at a given height and width. The plot data is returned in a base64-encoded string.

params.name: height
params.description: The requested plot height, in pixels

params.name: width
params.description: The requested plot width, in pixels

params.name: pixel_ratio
params.description: The pixel ratio of the display device

data.description: The plot data, as a base64-encoded string

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the plot data
